column5: Post your reports here, Thank you

Holy smokes man......there are two of you demons posting on this board !!!! LOL. I'll be sure to post my trip report when we are done terrorizing Gord and the other guests. It may be next year before I get the report done,but I'll post one for sure PjShorthorn
Ha ha Pat, I was told to re-register per the admin, was having login issues

Whew. I was thinking that I may have to posts two reports for both alter egos which would take approximately two years to get done. LOL.You may read another post I sent about camp boats. I mentioned that we will have GPS on the camp boat this year so I should be able to send you some coordinates on super secret squirrel spots where we find fish. That is if you are using your own boat and have GPS or a handheld GPS. It may be a little more accurate than my pencil marks on the maps...Ha !!!PjShorthorn
Yes, I will have my own boat this year, All GPS equipped
Cool. I'll be in touch after we get back. PjShorthorn
